attributes.action: Close British Boarders to all immigrants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned think that the Government should Close the British boarders to all immigrants unless they have prior arrangements for employment and have proof to the fact that they already have work offered and must stay within employment for a minimum of 5 years to help boost the uk economy 
   We also think that the Government should stop allowing immigrants already in the country from sponging from the state and make them work if they don't work then they should be deported straight back to there country of origin

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
